GSP33yamis_pu:0: tatra kasyacid ekasya vaśe viśvaṃ pravartate |
GSP33yamis_pu:1: iti sādhayituṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ pracakṣmahe || YIs_1 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:2: tatra mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ nāyaṃ sarvārthadarśanaśaktisampannaḥ puruṣo
GSP33yamis_pu:4: tathā hi asya pratyakṣam anyad vā sādhakaṃ bhavet ? pratyakṣam api laukikaṃ yaugikaṃ vā ?
GSP33yamis_pu:7: sarvārthadarśanaśaktiśālinam avagamayatā hi deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣavyavadhānajuṣaḥ sarva evārthās darśanaṃ śaktiś ca gocarayitavyāni /
GSP33yamis_pu:8: na ca vidyamānendriyasannikarṣayogyakatipayaviṣayaniyatavṛtter laukikapratyakṣasya niravadhir ayaṃ mahimā saṃbhāvanābhūmir iti katham iva tad iha sādhanam iti manyemahi /
GSP33yamis_pu:9: nāpi yogipratyakṣam asya sādhakam; yataḥ pratyakṣatve tad apy evaṃ vidyamānaikagocaram |
GSP33yamis_pu:11_0: tat khalu yogivijñānam aindriyakaṃ na vā ? aindriyakam api bahirindriyasambhavam āntarakaraṇajanitaṃ vā ? bahirindriyāṇi
GSP33yamis_pu:14: na cāvidyamānair ajātādibhiḥ saṃbhavati sannikarṣaḥ; tasya hy āśrayatvād āśrayābhāve tadasambhavāt
GSP33yamis_pu:17: bhavati ca yad yatsahakāri yatkāryajananam, tat tadabhāve na taj janayati ; yathā kṣitisalilasahakāri aṅkurakāryajananabījaṃ kṣityādyabhāve 'ṅkuram /
GSP33yamis_pu:18: arthasannikarṣasahakārīṇi bahirindriyāṇi jñānajananānīti tāny api nātīte
GSP33yamis_pu:19: 'nāgate vārthe jñānaṃ janayantīti na tad upajanitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yathoktaviṣayaniyamam atikrāmati
GSP33yamis_pu:20: nāpy antarakaraṇasambhavam, āntaragocara eva sukhādau svāntasvātantryāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:21: bāhyaviṣayamitiṣu ca manaso niraṅkuśakaraṇatāṅgīkāre hi kṛtaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:22: ataś ca kaścid andho badhiro vā bhavet /
GSP33yamis_pu:23: bhavati cātra vimatipadaṃ mano bahirindriyanirapekṣaṃ na bāhyapratyakṣagocare pravartate, tatra tattantravṛttitvāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:24: yady atra yattantravṛtti na tat tannirapekṣaṃ tatra pravartate, yathālokāpekṣapravṛtti cakṣuḥ
GSP33yamis_pu:26: na ca siddhāuṣadhamantratapaḥsamādhimahimasamāsāditātiśayānīndriyāṇi kadācid apajahati samadhigataviṣayaniyamam iti sambhavati;
GSP33yamis_pu:28: na khalu suprayuktabheṣajaśatavihitasaṃskāram api śrotraṃ rūparasavibhāvāvagamāya kalpate
GSP33yamis_pu:30: aindriyakaprakarṣatvāt, dṛśyamānatatprakarṣavad ity aindriyakaṃ jñānaṃ nātītādi gocarayati
GSP33yamis_pu:31_0: bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanas tu saty api viśadanirbhāsatve prācyānubhavagocarād anadhikam adhikaṃ vādhyavasyataḥ smṛtivibhramasrotasor
GSP33yamis_pu:31_1: anyatarāvartaparivartinaḥ kutaḥ prāmāṇyakūlapratilabhaḥ ? kutastarāṃ ca pratyakṣatayottambhanam ? /
GSP33yamis_pu:32: pratyakṣasya vā sataḥ katham iva viditaviṣayaniyamavyatikramaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:33: atikrāmato vā kutaḥ pratyakṣatvam iti na viśvānubhavāiśvaryaśālini pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33yamis_pu:35: tat khalv anumānam āgamo vā ? anumānam api viśeṣato
GSP33yamis_pu:36: dṛṣṭaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ vā ? tatra sakalapadavīdavīyasi bhavati na tāvat svalakṣaṇasākṣātkārapūrvakāvinābhāvāvadhāraṇādhīnodayatvād idam anumānam
GSP33yamis_pu:38: na hy anavagatacarahutabhujas tadavinābhāvitayā dhūmam anusandhātum īśate /
GSP33yamis_pu:39: na ca sarvārthanirmāṇasākṣātkārapaṭīyasi liṅgaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭam api kiñcana labhate /
GSP33yamis_pu:43: kāryatvād eva jagatas tatkartur anumīyatām || YIs_5 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:45: kāryaṃ ca vimatipadam avanigirimahārṇavādīti tad api tathāvidhabuddhimaddhetukam adhyavasīyate
GSP33yamis_pu:46: na ca kāryatvam asiddham iti vācyam, avayavasanniveśādibhir hetubhis tatsiddheḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:47: iha cānyāvayavibhyaḥ prabhṛti ādvyaṇukam akhilam avayavi kramanihīyamānanānāvayavavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣajanitam avagatam ity antata upādānaṃ caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ prapañcasya /
GSP33yamis_pu:48: teṣām ādiparispandasya tadanuguṇādṛṣṭaviśiṣṭatattatkṣetrajñasaṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇaka iti upakaraṇam api samastakṣetrajñavartini dharmādharmalakṣaṇāny adṛṣṭāni /
GSP33yamis_pu:51: na cāmī svasamavāyināv api dharmādharmāvalam avalokayitum iti tadatirekī nikhilabhuvananirmāṇanipuṇo
GSP33yamis_pu:53: puruṣadhaureyakaḥ kim iti na sāmānyatodṛṣṭaliṅgād anumīyate ?
GSP33yamis_pu:54: tad idam aviditānumānavṛttasya svamatiracitataralatarkollasitam iti parihasanti mīmāṃsakāḥ
GSP33yamis_pu:55: tathā hi kim idam ekacetanādhīnatvaṃ nāmābhipretaṃ tanubhuvanādeḥ ? /
GSP33yamis_pu:57: kim asya tasminn āyattaṃ kiṃ nu janmātha vā sthitiḥ |
GSP33yamis_pu:58: pravṛttir vādyayos tāvat sādhyahīnaṃ nidarśanam || YIs_6 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:60: ye hi yaddehādhīnasukhaduḥkhopabhogabhāginaḥ, bhavati hi taducitādṛṣṭaśālināṃ
GSP33yamis_pu:61: sarveṣām eva teṣāṃ taddehina iva tadutpattisthitinimittatvam /
GSP33yamis_pu:62: api ca śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavāyalakṣaṇā sthitir avayavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣād ṛte na cetayitāraṃ param apekṣate /
GSP33yamis_pu:64: sthitiḥ, na sā pakṣīkṛte kṣityādau sambhavatīti sthitim api naikarūpāṃ pakṣasapakṣānuyāyinīm udīkṣāmahe /
GSP33yamis_pu:68: cetanair bhoktṛbhir bhogyaḥ karmabhir janyate hi naḥ || YIs_7 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:69: yuktaṃ caitat yadubhayavādisiddhānām eva cetanānāṃ kartṛtvābhyupagamaḥ;

GSP33yamis_pu:74: adyavad eva viśvambharādayaḥ kramaprāptāgantukopacayāpacayaikadeśaśālino na yugapad eva niravaśeṣavilayajananabhāgina ityantimaparamāṇusākṣātkāro na kartṛbhāvopayogī /

GSP33yamis_pu:77: na khalu kulālādayaḥ kumbhādikāryam ārabhamāṇās tadupādānopakaraṇabhūtamṛddaṇḍacakrādikāryotpādanaśaktiṃ sākṣātkṛtya tat tad ārabhante /
GSP33yamis_pu:78: yadi paraṃ śaktim aviduṣām abhilaṣitasādhane tadupādānādivyavahāro 'nupapannaḥ, iha tu
GSP33yamis_pu:80: tena karmabhir ātmānaḥ sarvaṃ nirmimatāṃ pṛthak || YIs_10 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:81: api ca tad eva cetanakarṭrkaṃ jagati paridṛśyate, yad eva śakyakriyaṃ
GSP33yamis_pu:83: na ca tathā mahīmahīśvaramahārṇavādīti katham iva tattatkāryatvam ? kathantarāṃ ca tadupādānopakaraṇādeḥ
GSP33yamis_pu:84: ? yādṛśaṃ hi kāryam upādānādyabhijñapūrvakam avagataṃ ghaṭamaṇikādi,
GSP33yamis_pu:86_0: api cānīśvareṇa parimitaśaktijñānena vigrahavatānavāptakāmena kṛtam avagataṃ ghaṭādikāryam iti tathāvidhaṃ boddhāram upasthāpayan
GSP33yamis_pu:88: pramāṇāntaragocare hi liṅgini liṅgabalād āpatato viparītaviśeṣāṃs tatpramāṇam eva pratiruṇaddhi
GSP33yamis_pu:89: iha punar atipatitasakalamānāntarakarmabhāve sarvanirmāṇanipuṇe siṣādhayiṣite yāvanto 'nvayavyatirekāvadhāritāvinābhāvabhājo dharmās tān apy
GSP33yamis_pu:91: api ca svārthakāruṇyabhāvena vyāptāḥ prekṣāvataḥ kriyāḥ |
GSP33yamis_pu:93: avāptakāmatvān na tāvad ātmārthe sṛjati; pralayasamaye pralīnasakalakaraṇakalevarādibhogopakaraṇatayā ca cetanānāṃ duḥkhābhāvād duḥkhidarśanajanitakṛpāprayuktir api nāstīti
GSP33yamis_pu:97: na copādānādisākṣātkāriṇi eva kartṛtvam ity api niyamaḥ; upādānam upakaraṇaṃ cāviduṣa evātmano jñānādiṣu kartṛtvāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:98: ataḥ asiddhatvād viruddhatvād anaikāntyāc ca varṇitāt |
GSP33yamis_pu:100: prayogaś ca bhavati mahīmahīdharādi kāryaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33yamis_pu:107: tanubhuvanādīśvarakartṛkaṃ na bhavati kāryatvāt tadvad eva /
GSP33yamis_pu:108: īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati prayojanarahitatvād aśarīratvād vā muktātmavad iti /
GSP33yamis_pu:109: atra brūmo na kāryatvaṃ kṣityādau śakyanihnavam |
GSP33yamis_pu:113: na cedṛśa eva sanniveśaḥ kāryaḥ, netara ity avayavasanniveśaviśeṣapratiniyataṃ rūpabhedam udīkṣāmahe /
GSP33yamis_pu:114: yat tu śakyakriyaṃ śakyajñānopādānopakaraṇaṃ ca kriyata iti, tad astu nāma /
GSP33yamis_pu:115: kin tu te kriyājñānaśaktī kriyājñānābhyām eva samadhigamanīye /
GSP33yamis_pu:116: te ca kṣityādiṣu yathoktasādhanabalasamupasthāpite iti na viśeṣaḥ prasiddhaprākāragopurādikāryebhyas tanubhuvanādeḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:117: na caitāvān eva kriyāgocara iti viṣayaniyamaḥ kaścit kriyāyā dṛṣṭaḥ; yenedam aśakyakriyam adhyavasyema /
GSP33yamis_pu:118: siddhe ca kāryatve tadupādānādisakṣātkaraṇatadadhiṣṭhānatatpreraṇanipuṇaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ sidhyaty eva /
GSP33yamis_pu:121: sa ca dravyaiḥ saṃyogalakṣaṇaḥ, tadguṇais tu saṃyuktasamavāyarūpaḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:124: tābhyāṃ dharmādharmābhyām eva phalam, cetanānadhiṣṭhitānāṃ sarveṣām eteṣām
GSP33yamis_pu:126: na hi cetanena vardhakinānadhiṣṭhitā vāsī deśakālādisahakāriśatasamadhigame 'pi yūpādīny upādayitum alam /
GSP33yamis_pu:127: bījāṅkurādayas tu pakṣāntarbhūtā iti tair vyabhicāravacanam anabhijñatayaiva śrotriyāṇām /
GSP33yamis_pu:131: dṛṣṭānusāriṇī hi sarvatra kalpanā; na dṛṣṭavirodhinī /
GSP33yamis_pu:136: yat tu parimitaśaktijñānānaiśvaryādyāpādanād dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhanatvam udbhāvitam, tad
GSP33yamis_pu:138: na hi kiñcit kriyamāṇaṃ kartur arthāntaraviṣayam asāmarthyam ajñānaṃ vā svotpattaye 'pekṣate;
GSP33yamis_pu:142: api ca kiṃ taditarasamastavastuviṣayam ajñānādi vyāpakam, uta katipayagocaram iti
GSP33yamis_pu:145: na khalu kumbhakāraḥ kumbhātireki kim api na vijānāti /
GSP33yamis_pu:148: na cāsti kiñcidvyavasthitam, yad avidyādimān eva kartṛtām anubhavati /
GSP33yamis_pu:149: na ca śarīriṇaiva kartrā bhāvyam, śarīragrahaṇenaivānaikāntyāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:150: na khalu śarīraviśiṣṭas sann evāyam ātmā śarīram upādatte, ayogino yugapadanekaśarīragrahaṇāyogāt
GSP33yamis_pu:151: pūrvadehaparityāgena dehāntaraprāpakakarmapreritaprāṇasahāya eva dehāntaraṃ praviśatīty upapāditam ātmacintāyām /
GSP33yamis_pu:154: adhitiṣṭhāsitadehasaṃyogavata eva tatpravṛttyanuguṇaprayatnayogalakṣaṇam adhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭam iti cet; astv
GSP33yamis_pu:155: ekatattva(stva)sambaddhasyādhiṣṭhānānupapatteḥ preryavastusambandhinā prerakeṇa bhavitavyam iti; na yato 'nyad apy adhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ mānadaṇḍādi
GSP33yamis_pu:158: asti ceśvarasyāpi jagadupādānopakaraṇais sambandha ity uktam eva /
GSP33yamis_pu:160: dṛṣṭaṃ hi daṇḍacakrādiṣu karasaṃyogādinā kulālādeḥ pravartayitṛtvam ity
GSP33yamis_pu:163: katham asati śarīre parapreraṇātmakaḥ saṅkalpa iti cet; kiṃ śarīraṃ saṅkalpayati, yena tadabhāve na bhavet ? /
GSP33yamis_pu:164: karaṇam iti cen na; manasaḥ karaṇatvāt /

GSP33yamis_pu:170: / yāvad dhi dṛṣṭānuguṇaṃ vyāptayupayogi, tāvad anujñāyate /

GSP33yamis_pu:171_1: alaṃ nirmāṇāyety aparimitajñānāiśvaryaśaktiḥ śarīrādyanapekṣaḥ saṅkalpād eva sakalabhuvananirmāṇakṣamaḥ kartā siddhaḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:172: īdṛśena kartrā ghaṭādiṣu kāryatvasya sambandho na dṛṣṭa iti cet;

GSP33yamis_pu:173_1: dṛṣṭaḥ ? yena dhūmaviśeṣadarśanād giriśikhare tathāvidhāgnir anumīyate yādṛśo dhūmo yatrāvagataḥ tatraiva tādṛśas tatsampādanasamartho
GSP33yamis_pu:173_2: dṛṣtāntabhūmāv aparidṛṣṭo 'pi sāmānyavyāptibalena pakṣadharmatāvaśāt sidhyatīti cet; tad idam asmābhir abhidhīyamānaṃ kim
GSP33yamis_pu:174: ihāpi kāryatvaṃ samarthakartṛpūrvakatvena ghaṭādiṣu viditasambandhaniyamaṃ kṣtityādiṣu dṛśyamānaṃ svasampādanasamartham adṛṣṭapūrvam eva buddhimatkartāram upasthāpayati /
GSP33yamis_pu:177: api ca vibhudravyasaṃyoginaḥ parispandavataś ca sarvatra sparśavattvāvyabhicāre 'pi

GSP33yamis_pu:179: taijasasya vā rūpasparśayor anyattarasya vā prākaṭyaniyame 'pi

GSP33yamis_pu:181_1: ca tathābhyupagamaḥ, hanta tarhi prakṛtaviṣaye 'pi prasañjitadharmaviśeṣāṇām anupalambhabādhāviśeṣād anekaniyamadarśanavighātaprasaṅgāc
GSP33yamis_pu:185: ceṣṭate, acetanatvāt; yad acetanaṃ tat tathā, yathā tathāvidhaṃ kandukādi
